PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames

Header.header_1: A confidential service reserved for exceptional properties.

form.title: Check your property's eligibility
form.desc:
Secretimmo‚Äôs private sales service is exclusively dedicated to luxury, distinctive, or high-value properties.
To check if your property meets our criteria, we invite you to take an eligibility test.
Your data is processed in strict confidence and is never shared without your consent.
form.secretimmo_title: ‚úÖ Congratulations, your property is considered an exceptional property and could be marketed off-market!
form.secretimmo_desc: Please fill out the valuation request form to know the current value of your property.
form.nextimmo_subtitle: ‚ùå Your property is not considered an exceptional property and could not be marketed off-market!
form.nextimmo_title: The good news is that via Nextimmo, our on-market sales partner, you can sell it effectively.
form.nextimmo_desc: Please fill out the valuation request form to know the current value of your property.
form.terms_label: By checking this box, you accept our <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.
form.first_name_error: First name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
form.last_name_error: Last name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
form.submit_success: Your request has been successfully sent.
form.submit_error: An error occurred while sending the form. Please try again.
form.min_error: The minimum value must be greater than or equal to
form.max_error: he maximum value must be less than or equal to

Home.advantages_title: The advantages of launching the sale of your prestige property off-market with Secretimmo

advantages.0:
The benefits of launching your luxury property sale off-market with Secretimmo|A soft launch to an exclusive and targeted audience
Present your property to a selected group of partner agencies and our base of qualified active buyers, without immediate public exposure.
advantages.1: Show your property before you're ready for the market|Introduce your property to serious buyers even before investing in staging or preparation‚Äîwithout pressure.
advantages.2: Generate interest from the early stages|Create anticipation and demand without accumulating market days or risking a visible price drop.
advantages.3: Test your price and fine-tune your strategy|Confidentially analyze buyer feedback. These insights, gathered before any public listing, help you adjust your positioning with precision.
advantages.4: Attract serious and competitive offers|Receive strong offers from buyers willing to pay a premium for certainty, rarity, and discretion.
advantages.5: Protect your privacy|Your confidentiality is a priority. Photos, floor plans, and property details are only accessible to Secretimmo agents and their selected clients.
